name: LightBox
description:
LightBox is a puzzle-stealth-narrative game made in two weeks by me, Enemby for the /r/IndieDev Mix Tape Jam. I made it alone, and I was still going to school and all of my daily life throughout the jam, so it's really small. I learned quite a bit about how narrative is handled in games, as well as lighting and limited state machines. It was a good jam.

Included:

  • Zip Download for each platform.
  • Source Code
  • Soundtrack

Enjoy the game!

Please note that this won't run on new MacOSX updates. Nothing I can do about that, sadly.
